Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi (2013)


-:Release Info:-

Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi (English: Blue Skies, Green Waters, Red Earth) is a 2013 Malayalam road movie directed and co-produced by Sameer Thahir and written by Hashir Muhammad. The film features Dulquer Salmaan, Dhritiman Chatterjee and Sunny Wayne in the lead roles.
The film revolves around two college students who go on a road trip to Nagaland from Kerala.

Directed by : Sameer Thahir
Produced by : Sameer Thahir
Written by : Hashir Mohamed
Starring : Dulquer Salmaan, Dhritiman Chatterjee, Sunny Wayne
Music by : Rex Vijayan
Cinematography : Gireesh Gangadharan
Editing by : A. Sreekar Prasad
Studio : Happyhours Entertainment, E4 Entertainment
Release date : 9 August 2013
Country : India
Language : Malayalam
